\w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* comforted \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w each|strong="G1223"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w other|strong="G1161"\w*’s \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w yours|strong="G4771"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w mine|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* ignorant, \w brethren|strong="G3588"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w oftentimes|strong="G4178"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w purposed|strong="G4388"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* (\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w hindered|strong="G2967"\w* hitherto), \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w rest|strong="G3062"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* invisible \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w since|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w creation|strong="G2937"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w clearly|strong="G2529"\w* \w seen|strong="G2529"\w*, \w being|strong="G1510"\w* perceived \w through|strong="G3539"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w made|strong="G4161"\w*, \add even \add*\w his|strong="G1438"\w* everlasting \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* divinity; \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w without|strong="G2532"\w* excuse:

Amen.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w cause|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w gave|strong="G3860"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w up|strong="G3860"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* vile \w passions|strong="G3806"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w women|strong="G2338"\w* \w changed|strong="G3337"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w natural|strong="G5446"\w* \w use|strong="G5540"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* \w nature|strong="G5449"\w*:

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w likewise|strong="G3668"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w*, \w leaving|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w natural|strong="G5446"\w* \w use|strong="G5540"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w woman|strong="G1572"\w*, \w burned|strong="G1722"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* lust \w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G1438"\w*, \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w working|strong="G2716"\w* unseemliness, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* receiving \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* recompense \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w error|strong="G4106"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w due|strong="G1163"\w*.

being \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* \w with|strong="G4137"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* unrighteousness, \w wickedness|strong="G4189"\w*, \w covetousness|strong="G4124"\w*, \w maliciousness|strong="G2549"\w*; \w full|strong="G3324"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w envy|strong="G5355"\w*, \w murder|strong="G5408"\w*, \w strife|strong="G2054"\w*, \w deceit|strong="G1388"\w*, \w malignity|strong="G2550"\w*; \w whisperers|strong="G5588"\w*,

\w backbiters|strong="G2637"\w*, hateful \w to|strong="G2556"\w* \w God|strong="G2319"\w*, \w insolent|strong="G5197"\w*, haughty, boastful, \w inventors|strong="G2182"\w* \w of|strong="G2182"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w things|strong="G2556"\w*, disobedient \w to|strong="G2556"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w*,
without understanding, covenant-breakers, without natural affection, unmerciful:

\w who|strong="G3588"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1921"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w ordinance|strong="G1345"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* practise \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* worthy \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w same|strong="G2532"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* consent \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* practise \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.
